name: Igor
description: Igor is a Discord bot that provides detailed information on Persona 5 and Persona 5 Royal, covering characters, items, abilities, and more. Designed to make game info easily accessible, and allows users to get insights directly in Discord without needing external searches.

name: Pomodoro Sudy Technique
description: A timer application that lets users use the study techniqye called pomodoro.

name: Password Manager
description: A Password Management Website that securely stores and manages login credentials, featuring Google authentication and encrypted storage.

name: WeatherAPI
description: Weather application designed to keep you informed about the latest weather conditions anywhere in the world.

name: Tic Tac Toe
description: A simple and interactive Tic-Tac-Toe game built with Vue 3 and styled using TailwindCSS.

name: SMASH-BROS
description: The Smash Bros Combo Guide is a React app for looking up character combos. It fetches data from a Node.js & Express API and features React Router & SCSS. Built for a course to learn API integration, frontend development, and UI design.

name: SMASH-BROS Server
description: The Smash Bros Combo API is a Node.js & Express backend that manages character combo data. It uses Sequelize with an SQL database to handle data retrieval and storage. Built for a course to learn backend development, RESTful APIs, and database management.

name: Webshop Administration
description: My first Java project, built for a course assignment, showcasing my understanding of Java and OOP concepts at the time.

name: RecipeHub
description: A website to save all my recipes using supabase for also file storages (video and images).
